metadata.feature_description: Browse through paginated list of user's recent activities with details about area, action, and timestamp

steps.actual: Users list displayed showing 15 total users with pagination controls

steps.action: Click User Activity icon for Test User12
steps.expected: Activity panel should expand showing recent activities
steps.actual: Activity panel expanded showing 'Recent Activity' section with 1 activity item: 'Joined Site 2 weeks ago - Evoq Content Library'

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify relative date formatting for activities

steps.action: View activity panel for Content Editor user
steps.expected: Activities should display with relative date format
steps.actual: Activities displayed with relative dates: 'Followed by another user 1 hour ago' and 'Joined Site 2 weeks ago'

steps.action: View activity panel for Content Editor (shows 2 activities)
Click on Test User's activity icon
steps.expected: Activity panel should update to show Test User's data
steps.actual: Activity panel updated to show Test User data: Rank 5, Reputation 5, Experience 5, 1 activity - confirming auto-refresh works

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify SuperUser activities cannot be viewed

steps.action: Navigate to page 2 of users list
steps.expected: SuperUser Account should be visible in the list
steps.actual: SuperUser Account visible in the users list on page 2

steps.action: Verify icon availability on SuperUser Account row
steps.expected: SuperUser Account should NOT have User Activity icon (by design)
steps.actual: Confirmed: SuperUser Account row only shows Profile Settings and Account Settings icons. User Activity icon is NOT present, while other users (Content Editor) have the activity icons

steps.expected: Each activity should show the area/module where the activity occurred
steps.actual: Activities correctly display area information: 'Evoq Content Library' for site join, 'Activities' for follow action

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Navigate to next page of activities

steps.action: Find user with more than 10 activities to test pagination
steps.expected: Should find a user with enough activities to trigger pagination
steps.actual: No users in the system have more than 10 activities. All test users have only 1-2 activities (mostly just 'Joined Site'). Pagination controls are not visible in the Recent Activity section because all users have fewer than 10 activities

issues: Unable to test pagination navigation - no users have sufficient activity data (>10 activities required to show pagination)

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Navigate to previous page of activities

steps.action: Navigate to page 2 then back to page 1 of activities
steps.expected: Should be able to navigate back to previous page
steps.actual: Cannot test - no pagination controls are visible because no user has more than 10 activities

issues: Unable to test pagination navigation - insufficient activity data

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify page size fixed at 10 items

steps.action: Verify activities are paginated with 10 items per page
steps.expected: Recent Activity section should show 10 activities per page
steps.actual: Cannot verify page size - no user has more than 10 activities to demonstrate the page boundary

issues: Unable to verify page size - all users have fewer than 10 activities

steps.actual: All users in the system have at least the 'Joined Site' activity automatically recorded. Cannot find a user with zero activities to test the empty state message.

issues: Unable to test empty activities - all users have at least 'Joined Site' activity automatically recorded

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify activities sorted by date (newest first)

steps.action: View Content Editor activities which has multiple entries
steps.expected: Activities should be sorted with newest first
steps.actual: Activities are correctly sorted: 'Followed by another user 1 hour ago' appears before 'Joined Site 2 weeks ago' - confirming newest-first order

observations: Pagination controls in Recent Activity section are only rendered when there are more than 10 activities. Since no test users have sufficient activities, pagination UI could not be directly tested.

All users automatically receive a 'Joined Site' activity entry upon registration, making it impossible to test the 'No recent activities' empty state without manually creating a user through the database.
SuperUser activities are correctly hidden by design - the User Activity icon is not shown for SuperUser accounts in the users list.
The feature code files specified in the test prompt were not available in the repository (repository directory was empty), so testing was performed purely based on UI behavior.
Activity entries correctly display: action description, relative time format, and area/module name
The Recent Activity section appears to be a fixed-height container with the activity list inside, which would scroll or paginate when there are many activities.
